original: 回復時間：$Skill_CD(2686)@在武將四周，召喚出10名虎豹騎，攻擊附近的敵人。虎豹騎屬性體力值：$Soldier_HP(1216)@武力值：$Soldier_Str(1216)@
text: Reply time:  $Skill_CD(2686)@ Around the generals, summon 10 tiger and leopard riders to attack nearby enemies. Tiger and leopard rider attribute physical strength:  $Soldier_HP(1216)@武力值:  $Soldier_Str(1216)@
